name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: All those people with ADHD who started new mastodon servers recently... They're either about to get bored of it or already bored of it. Which isn't good news for things like maintenance or moderation. If you care about the server you've just joined, help them.
content.value:
All those people with ADHD who started new mastodon servers recently...

They're either about to get bored of it or already bored of it.

Which isn't good news for things like maintenance or moderation.

If you care about the server you've just joined, help them.
